subject: Dear,
body:
Dear,
 
I am the Director of Benefits and Credit Operations for HM Revenue and Custom UK {HMRC}. I was in the entourage with my Prime Minister, Rishi Sunak, at the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) Summit last month; September 18/19, 2023
in New York. I have the opportunity of going through your country's premier business brochure and industrial body,trade bodies and Industry Associations.
I have a mutually beneficial proposal to discuss with you.
Kindly revert back on receipt of this mail to enable me
divulge further details. I'm look forward to your reply
 
email: 
nasir3abba@gmail.com
Best regards
Nasir Abba

subject: Re: Dear,
body:
Hello Nasir Abba,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It sounds like you had quite an interesting experience at the Goals SDG Summit last month! I'm intrigued by your proposal and would love to hear more about it. Could you please provide some more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Frances
